overview: Horny doctors practice more than medicine when they get their hands on their hunky patients! In it’s original Italian…the language of lust!!! A trip to the hospital displaces discomfort with tranquility. rather, serenity, but not calm when the doctors and patients get into gritty, intimate details! to which details we refer you’ll have to see in this video of “clinical acclimation.
title: Gay Day Hospital
